metadata.name: User Added to Remote Desktop Users Group
metadata.comment: Detects addition of users to the local Remote Desktop Users group via "Net" or "Add-LocalGroupMember".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('localgroup ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add-localgroupmember ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('remote desktop users')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('utilisateurs du bureau à distance')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('usuarios de escritorio remoto'))))

output.summary: Detects addition of users to the local Remote Desktop Users group via "Net" or "Add-LocalGroupMember".
